G

generateBill(int, String, String, int, double, String) - Static method in class presentation.PDFCreator
Generates a bill pdf file containing the information given as parameters.
generateClientsReport(ArrayList<Clients>) - Static method in class presentation.PDFCreator
Generates a pdf file with a table containing the client information given in the ArrayList provided as parameter.
generateOrdersReport(ArrayList<OrderReportEntity>) - Static method in class presentation.PDFCreator
Generates a pdf file with a table containing the order information given in the ArrayList provided as parameter.
generateProductsReport(ArrayList<Products>) - Static method in class presentation.PDFCreator
Generates a pdf file with a table containing the product information given in the ArrayList provided as parameter.
generateUnderstockedNotice(String, int, String, int, String) - Static method in class presentation.PDFCreator
Generates an understocked notice pdf, telling the user which product is understocked and why (which client tried to get more units than existing and what was that amount).
getAddress() - Method in class model.Clients
 
getAllFields() - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
 
getAllOrderFields() - Method in class dao.OrdersDAO
Creates a list of OrderReportEntity objects: the client and product name are got from their specific tables according to the id specified in the orders table, the price and date fields being got from order_details table according to the order id.
